room_title: Escape room "The Prison" by Fox in a Box Chicago in Chicago
review: Great experience and a lot of fun. Our host Spring was amazing! Looking forward to trying the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Prison" by Fox in a Box Chicago in Chicago
review: Took our three boys (12, 14, 21) here...and we all had a blast!!! What a fun time and something a little different...boys were asking when we could come back!

room_title: Escape room "The Prison" by Fox in a Box Chicago in Chicago
review: A very well organized puzzle. It was our first time playing this kind of locked room game, and though my dad was very skeptical going in, everyone ended up having a great time. It also made for great dinner conversation afterwards :)

room_title: Escape room "The Prison" by Fox in a Box Chicago in Chicago
review: It was our first time doing something like this ever. Vince was awesome at explaining everything to us and was really nice! It was probably one of the most adrenaline rush experiences ever. I would come back again with my friends and family. This was a real life puzzle and I'm glad we did it!

room_title: Escape room "The Prison" by Fox in a Box Chicago in Chicago
review: Located in a cool, secured building, you feel a sense of anticipation. My daughters selected the bank robber activity to celebrate my birthday. We entered a bright and cheery reception room and were greeted by 2 friendly staff who made us feel comfortable. Crystal, our fab game master, explained the rules and gave us items needed in our quest. I instantly channeled my inner Catwoman. We entered the room and frantically tried to figure out clues that would lead us into the vault to access the gems in the allotted timeframe. My inner Catwoman took a hike when the lights went out and the background noises began. This was a great team builder and made us definitely think outside the box. The experience was creepy and hilarious and energizing. Although we failed to open the vault in time, a good time was had by all! We plan on doing this again! Game on, Crystal!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Prison" by Fox in a Box Chicago in Chicago
review: We got married at the courthouse and were looking for something fun to do with the wedding party. We booked The Bunker to start with and had so much fun that we stayed and played The Bank and The Lab. Game masters Vincent and Krystal were a lot of fun and made the experience great. The facility looks great and the little extras they provide while they're setting up your experience add a nice touch to the whole vibe of the place.

room_title: Escape room "The Prison" by Fox in a Box Chicago in Chicago
review: We did the vault. It was one of best attractions that I've been to in Chicago. A lot of fun and definitely worth the money. Definitely a great place to visit!

room_title: Escape room "The Prison" by Fox in a Box Chicago in Chicago
review: This place rocks!! We saved the world from zombies and escaped from jail in two weeks!! Clearly the best room escape in the Midwest!
